title: Flag of Luxembourg
cardDescription: The flag of Luxembourg consists of three horizontal stripes, red, white and blue, and can be in 1:2 or 3:5 ratio.
description: The flag of Luxembourg consists of three horizontal stripes, red, white and blue, and can be in 1:2 or 3:5 ratio. The tricolor flag is almost identical to that of the Netherlands, except that it is longer and its blue stripe is a lighter shade.

content.content: Make sure to choose the blue color as bright enough. It needs to clearly be more lighter and more brighter than that of the flag of the Netherlands. Also changing this pattern to 1:2 might help to differentiate the two easier.
This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 30, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn

content.content: For help with the pattern, please see the General Instructions from the main page:
